entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
